name: Pando File
summary: Learn about .PANDO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PANDO files are similar to .TORRENT files in that they contain data about the file/files to be downloaded, but not the actual file data.
NOTE: Pando stopped its services on August 31, 2013. The program is no longer available, rendering PANDO files obsolete.

description: Contains meta-data information of a file or group of files to be transferred using Pando, a program used to transfer files similarly to a BitTorrent client; used to reference other locations of the file/files to download from.
